name: genomic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the complete set of genetic material of a human, animal, plant, or other living thing: Human genomic DNA was analyzed. Researchers have mapped the genomic sequence of the deadly E. coli germ.
More examplesFewer examplesDr Dubrova has yet to find convincing evidence of genomic instability in people.The measurement was done before genomic activation.These techniques would miss mutations caused by genomic rearrangements.
